content: There was a report from the neighbours because a drunkard was making noise in the park. When the police officers arrived at the scene, Kusanagi was alone, dead drunk and completely naked.
translations: ita:C'è stata una denuncia dai vicini perché un ubriaco stava facendo rumore nel parco. Quando i poliziotti sono arrivati su
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
